Class RobustThielSenFocusFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.embl.rieslab.emu.uiexamples.htsmlm.autopilot.finder.RobustThielSenFocusFinder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FocusFinderInterface<java.lang.Double>

    public class RobustThielSenFocusFinder
extends java.lang.Object
implements FocusFinderInterface<java.lang.Double>
    Robust focus finder based on the {code TheilSenRobustExtremumFinder}.
    Author:
    royer
